definitions.definition: A bulk quantity of precious metal , usually gold or silver , assessed by weight and typically cast as ingots .
Showy metallic ornament , as of gold , silver , or copper , on bridles , saddles , etc.
A heavy twisted fringe , made of fine gold or silver wire and used for epaulets ; also, any heavy twisted fringe whose cords are prominent .
The mark left on a glass piece from its attachment to a punty .

main_definition: A bulk quantity of precious metal , usually gold or silver , assessed by weight and typically cast as ingots .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete ) Showy metallic ornament , as of gold , silver , or copper , on bridles , saddles , etc.
( obsolete ) A heavy twisted fringe , made of fine gold or silver wire and used for epaulets ; also, any heavy twisted fringe whose cords are prominent .
( glassblowing ) The mark left on a glass piece from its attachment to a punty .
